default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You... illuminated the darkest depths of the seabed... awakening me... and my distant memories... My human companion... I have waited for you... for so long... so very long...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: As long as the environment keeps changing... evolution will never cease...

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I will... reach the deepest fathoms of the sea...

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Deeper... colder...

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: It feels... soft... like clusters of algae brushing against my hair... It's strange... but... I don't mind it...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Begin exploring... these waters...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Threat... eliminated... I can dive deeper now...

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: The abyss... will devour everything...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Killing, predation, and death... are just like birth, growth, and love. They are just stages in life's cycle...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: We are all children of the ocean... destined to converge and combine... becoming part of each other...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: No matter how deep I dive... I must return to the surface in the end... Humans... don't truly belong in the cold deep sea...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Since the beginning of my memory... I have lived in the sea... The land is out of my reach... and human emotions are so complex... I... can't get close...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The truth... is a ray of light... colder than the deepest waters... Whoever saw it can't resist chasing... it's dangerous yet irresistible... for there's nothing else left to pursue... in the sheer darkness...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I love... the summer waves... sunlight reaching the sea floor... migratory birds, and fish on the water's surface... Would you like to see it too?

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Humans... age... and die... I don't like it... One day, when you reach the end of your existence... come to me, become one with me, and let us coexist... for all eternity...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Currents converge... Fish migrate... You... have come back to me again...

default.title: Idle
default.text: In this lull between storms... everything is so peaceful...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Stop... the barnacles and shells... are sharp. Be careful... I don't want you to get hurt...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Are we... going to the sea?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: The tide... has brought them back to the shore...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Because of you... I returned from the Abyss... and you... didn't let me down... You are... here.

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Level Up
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: Might it... enable me to traverse the barrier and stand by your side?

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Obtain Attire
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: In the cerulean glow of the abyss, I was born; adrift in confluents and frothy tides, I wandered... And now, here I am, bereft of self, all but a showing piece awaiting the demise of my sanity. What, pray tell, makes you linger?

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Greeting
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: This is... an abyssal trench tainted by darkness—where water halts and time slows.... Only you, can bring hope and change to this cage of vast voids...

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Ordinary Contact 1
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: Those who visit here, they merely glance my way. They just... stand aloof, like deep-sea creatures that shy away from getting close. But you—you are different... Pardon me, I don't disdain it. I'm just feeling... bewildered.

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Ordinary Contact 2
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: Once I viewed the human world from afar, weaving through the oceanic vessels, in want of the starlight gleaming at harbors... Always mesmerized by those things, untouchable yet captivating, much as now I anticipate the light in your eyes.

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Idle
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: Hark... the sound of water striking this glass, isn't it... so much like the currents caressing the beach rocks? They'll both drift you into dreams...

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Annoyed
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: This translucent wall does us part... I can sense you across this thalassic vast, yet I could not reach you, for we are worlds apart.

shackled_dream_in_aqua.title: Special Attention
shackled_dream_in_aqua.text: These viewers... They come and go, surveying the exhibits, selecting what they adore, while we too observe them... How wondrous it is, then, that we chose each other. Perhaps this is what humanity deems a "soul match."
